= Geo IP Database Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to geo ip database configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/geo_ip_db.adoc[]


[[option_geoip_city_db]]
== geoip_city_db
Absolute path to the GeoIP City database file.For prior version see geoip_database

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 17.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `GEOIP_CITY_DB` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_Path[Path].

Odoo cli used:

* --geoip-city-db

[NOTE]
====
Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 16.0 this key used the cli `--geoip-db`
====

[[option_geoip_country_db]]
== geoip_country_db
Absolute path to the GeoIP Country database file.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 17.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `GEOIP_COUNTRY_DB` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_Path[Path].

Odoo cli used:

* --geoip-country-db
